name: Nutrical Solution Ltd
description: Developer of a web-based software intended to facilitate businesses in the food industry to understand and effectively communicate data about their food. The company provides data and intelligence to businesses in the food industry such as calories, nutrition, allergies, and so on enabling clients to comply with local regulations, food labeling, and consumer marketing.
one_liner: Developer of a web-based software intended to facilitate businesses in the food industry to understand and effectively communicate data about their food. The company provides data and intelligence to businesses in the food industry such as calories, nutrition, allergies, and so on enabling clients to comply with local regulations, food labeling, and consumer marketing.
